entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 9:48 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:48 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
